article_title: IDF says killed hostages were holding white cloth on a stick.
sentence: IDF  says  killed  hostages  were  holding  white  cloth  on  a  stick.

article_title: IDF says killed hostages were holding white cloth on a stick.
sentence: The  three  Israeli  hostages  who  were  mistakenly  killed  in  Gaza  by  the  Israeli  military  on  Friday  had  been  holding  up  a  white  cloth  on  a  stick,  the  IDF  says.
